content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide a detailed assembly plan.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure appears to be a toy train-like construction
- It has multiple layers and consists of different colored blocks (red, yellow, green, blue, and orange)
- The base consists of orange cylindrical blocks as wheels
- The main body has red arches, yellow semicylindrical tops, and vertical elements
- There's a blue cube and yellow horizontal piece at the end

Block Count and Layers:
- Base layer: 2 orange cylinders (wheels)
- Middle layer: 2 red arches, yellow horizontal piece
- Upper layer: 2 yellow semicylindrical pieces, 2 green vertical blocks, 2 yellow vertical blocks
- Top: 1 blue cube

Assembly Order (from bottom to top, front to back):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 14 (orange horizontal cylinder - front wheel)
    Step2: Move block with index 14 (orange horizontal cylinder - back wheel)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (red arch - front)
    Step4: Move block with index 2 (red arch - back)
    Step5: Move block with index 11 (yellow horizontal piece for the end)
    Step6: Move block with index 15 (yellow semicylinder - front)
    Step7: Move block with index 15 (yellow semicylinder - back)
    Step8: Move block with index 9 (green vertical block - front)
    Step9: Move block with index 10 (green vertical block - back)
    Step10: Move block with index 12 (yellow vertical block - front)
    Step11: Move block with index 12 (yellow vertical block - back)
    Step12: Move block with index 5 (blue cube at the end)
}

The structure uses multiple instances of the same block type (particularly blocks 14, 15, and 12), but they are used in identical orientations as shown in the dictionary.
